languages.text: {n}Когда Мейв замирает перед вами в финальном реверансе, на ее щеках играет румянец.{/n} "Надеюсь, сей скромный танец достоен очей ваших, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда Лидзи замирает перед вами в финальном реверансе — на ее щеках играет румянец.{/n} "Я, конечно, не танцовщица, но это так заряжает меня энергией, звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Как иных господ — их горький рекаф".

languages.text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Когда Мейв замирает перед вами в финальном реверансе, на ее щеках играет румянец.{/n} "Надеюсь, сей скромный танец достоен очей ваших, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}When Maive comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"
{n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

{n}When Lidzy comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I have no great talent, of course, but dancing energises me, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! Other people drink bitter recaf for the same effect."
{n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"
{n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"
{n}When Maive comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"
{n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

languages.text: {n}当她终于在你面前停下来，行着最后的屈膝礼时，她的脸颊变得通红。{/n}“希望这卑微的舞蹈配得上您的目光，来自上界的大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}当她终于在你面前停下来，行着最后的屈膝礼时，她的脸颊变得通红。{/n}“希望这卑微的舞蹈配得上您的目光，来自上界的大人！”

languages.text: {n}Cuando se detiene frente a ti y hace una última reverencia, sus mejillas están sonrojadas.{/n} «¡Confío en que esta humilde danza haya sido digna de sus ojos, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial!».
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando se detiene frente a ti y hace una última reverencia, sus mejillas están sonrojadas.{/n} «¡Confío en que esta humilde danza haya sido digna de sus ojos, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial!».

languages.text: {n}Son bir reveransla önünde durduğunda, yanaklarının kızardığını fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Umarım bu naçizane dansım, gözlerinize layık olmuştur Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}!"
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Son bir reveransla önünde durduğunda, yanaklarının kızardığını fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Umarım bu naçizane dansım, gözlerinize layık olmuştur Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}!"

languages.text: {n}彼女は最後のお辞儀であなたの前に来て立ち止まると、頬は赤く染まる。{/n}「このお粗末な踊りがあなたのお眼鏡にかなうことを願いますわ、天の{mf|君|姫}！」
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は最後のお辞儀であなたの前に来て立ち止まると、頬は赤く染まる。{/n}「このお粗末な踊りがあなたのお眼鏡にかなうことを願いますわ、天の{mf|君|姫}！」

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'enfin elle s'arrête devant vous pour exécuter une ultime révérence, elle a les joues rouges.{/n} « J'espère que cette humble danse vous a plu, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'enfin elle s'arrête devant vous pour exécuter une ultime révérence, elle a les joues rouges.{/n} « J'espère que cette humble danse vous a plu, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: {n}Als sie schließlich mit einem letzten Knicks vor dir stehen bleibt, sind ihre Wangen gerötet.{/n} "Ich hoffe, dieser bescheidene Tanz war Eurer Augen würdig, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}When she comes to a stop before you in a final curtsy, her cheeks are flushed.{/n} "I hope this humble dance was worthy of your eyes, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sie schließlich mit einem letzten Knicks vor dir stehen bleibt, sind ihre Wangen gerötet.{/n} "Ich hoffe, dieser bescheidene Tanz war Eurer Augen würdig, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}!"
